# VEDA APIs {.unnumbered}

The VEDA API source code is currently stored in a private repository: [delta-backend](https://github.com/NASA-IMPACT/delta-backend) but is based off [eoAPI](https://github.com/developmentseed/eoAPI)

## Environments

### Development, aka Dev (experimental work, expected downtime)

* STAC API (metadata): [https://dev-stac.delta-backend.xyz/docs](https://dev-stac.delta-backend.xyz/docs)
* List collections: [https://dev-stac.delta-backend.xyz/collections](https://dev-stac.delta-backend.xyz/collections)
* Raster API (tiling): [https://dev-raster.delta-backend.xyz/docs](https://dev-raster.delta-backend.xyz/docs)
* STAC viewer (geojson feature results of basic STAC searches): [https://dev-stac.delta-backend.xyz/index.html](https://dev-stac.delta-backend.xyz/index.html)
* STAC browser (interactive STAC catalog browser): [http://delta-dev-stac-browser.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com](http://delta-dev-stac-browser.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com). *Read more about the development of this browser [here](https://medium.com/radiant-earth-insights/the-exciting-future-of-the-stac-browser-2351143aa24b)*

### Staging (maintenance will be announced):

* STAC API (metadata): [https://staging-stac.delta-backend.xyz/docs](https://staging-stac.delta-backend.xyz/docs)
* List collections: [https://staging-stac.delta-backend.xyz/collections](https://staging-stac.delta-backend.xyz/collections)
* Raster API (tiling): [https://staging-raster.delta-backend.xyz/docs](https://staging-raster.delta-backend.xyz/docs)
* STAC viewer (geojson feature results of basic STAC searches): [https://staging-stac.delta-backend.xyz/index.html](https://staging-stac.delta-backend.xyz/index.html)
* STAC browser (interactive STAC catalog browser): [http://delta-staging-stac-browser.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com](http://delta-staging-stac-browser.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com). *Read more about the development of this browser [here](https://medium.com/radiant-earth-insights/the-exciting-future-of-the-stac-browser-2351143aa24b)*

### Production: COMING SOON
